member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE
member.summary: Passed to theCopyFile2ProgressRoutine callback function with information about a pending copy operation.

summary.para: Value from the enumeration used as a discriminant for the Info union within this structure.

listheader.description: Indicates a single chunk of a stream has started to be copied. Information is in the ChunkStarted structure within the Info union.
Indicates the copy of a single chunk of a stream has completed. Information is in the ChunkFinished structure within the Info union.

Indicates both source and destination handles for a stream have been opened and the copy of the stream is about to be started. Information is in the StreamStarted structure within the Info union. This does not indicate that the copy has started for that stream.

Indicates the copy operation for a stream have started to be completed, either successfully or due to a COPYFILE2_PROGRESS_STOP return from CopyFile2ProgressRoutine. Information is in the StreamFinished structure within the Info union.
May be sent periodically. Information is in the PollContinue structure within the Info union.
An error was encountered during the copy operation. Information is in the Error structure within the Info union.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.ChunkStarted
member.summary: This structure is selected if the Type member is set toCOPYFILE2_CALLBACK_CHUNK_STARTED (1).

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.ChunkStarted.dwStreamNumber
member.summary: Indicates which stream within the file is about to be copied. The value used for identifying a stream within a file will start at one (1) and will always be higher than any previous stream for that file.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.ChunkStarted.dwReserved
member.summary: This member is reserved for internal use.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.ChunkStarted.hSourceFile
member.summary: Handle to the source stream.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.ChunkStarted.hDestinationFile
member.summary: Handle to the destination stream.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.ChunkStarted.uliChunkNumber
member.summary: Indicates which chunk within the current stream is about to be copied. The value used for a chunk will start at zero (0) and will always be higher than that of any previous chunk for the current stream.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.ChunkStarted.uliChunkSize
member.summary: Size of the copied chunk, in bytes.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.ChunkStarted.uliStreamSize
member.summary: Size of the current stream, in bytes.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.ChunkStarted.uliTotalFileSize
member.summary: Size of all streams for this file, in bytes.

summary.para: This structure is selected if the Type member is set toCOPYFILE2_CALLBACK_CHUNK_FINISHED (2).
This member is reserved for internal use.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.ChunkFinished.dwStreamNumber
member.summary: Indicates which stream within the file is about to be copied. The value used for identifying a stream within a file will start at one (1) and will always be higher than any previous stream for that file.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.ChunkFinished.hSourceFile
member.summary: Handle to the source stream.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.ChunkFinished.hDestinationFile
member.summary: Handle to the destination stream.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.ChunkFinished.uliChunkNumber
member.summary: Indicates which chunk within the current stream is in process. The value used for a chunk will start at zero (0) and will always be higher than that of any previous chunk for the current stream.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.ChunkFinished.uliChunkSize
member.summary: Size of the copied chunk, in bytes.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.ChunkFinished.uliStreamSize
member.summary: Size of the current stream, in bytes.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.ChunkFinished.uliStreamBytesTransferred
member.summary: Total bytes copied for this stream so far.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.ChunkFinished.uliTotalFileSize
member.summary: Size of all streams for this file, in bytes.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.ChunkFinished.uliTotalBytesTransferred
member.summary: Total bytes copied for this file so far.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.StreamStarted
member.summary: This structure is selected if the Type member is set toCOPYFILE2_CALLBACK_STREAM_STARTED (3).

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.StreamStarted.dwStreamNumber
member.summary: Indicates which stream within the file is about to be copied. The value used for identifying a stream within a file will start at one (1) and will always be higher than any previous stream for that file.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.StreamStarted.dwReserved
member.summary: This member is reserved for internal use.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.StreamStarted.hSourceFile
member.summary: Handle to the source stream.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.StreamStarted.hDestinationFile
member.summary: Handle to the destination stream.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.StreamStarted.uliStreamSize
member.summary: Size of the current stream, in bytes.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.StreamStarted.uliTotalFileSize
member.summary: Size of all streams for this file, in bytes.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.StreamFinished
member.summary: This structure is selected if the Type member is set toCOPYFILE2_CALLBACK_STREAM_FINISHED (4).

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.StreamFinished.dwStreamNumber
member.summary: Indicates which stream within the file is about to be copied. The value used for identifying a stream within a file will start at one (1) and will always be higher than any previous stream for that file.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.StreamFinished.dwReserved
member.summary: This member is reserved for internal use.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.StreamFinished.hSourceFile
member.summary: Handle to the source stream.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.StreamFinished.hDestinationFile
member.summary: Handle to the destination stream.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.StreamFinished.uliStreamSize
member.summary: Size of the current stream, in bytes.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.StreamFinished.uliStreamBytesTransferred
member.summary: Total bytes copied for this stream so far.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.StreamFinished.uliTotalFileSize
member.summary: Size of all streams for this file, in bytes.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.StreamFinished.uliTotalBytesTransferred
member.summary: Total bytes copied for this file so far.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.PollContinue
member.summary: This structure is selected if the Type member is set toCOPYFILE2_CALLBACK_POLL_CONTNUE (5).

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.PollContinue.dwReserved
member.summary: This member is reserved for internal use.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.Error
member.summary: This structure is selected if the Type member is set toCOPYFILE2_CALLBACK_ERROR (6).

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.Error.CopyPhase
member.summary: Value from the enumeration indicating the current phase of the copy at the time of the error.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.Error.dwStreamNumber
member.summary: The number of the stream that was being processed at the time of the error.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.Error.hrFailure
member.summary: Value indicating the problem.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.Error.dwReserved
member.summary: This member is reserved for internal use.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.Error.uliChunkNumber
member.summary: Indicates which chunk within the current stream was being processed at the time of the error. The value used for a chunk will start at zero (0) and will always be higher than that of any previous chunk for the current stream.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.Error.uliStreamSize
member.summary: Size, in bytes, of the stream being processed.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.Error.uliStreamBytesTransferred
member.summary: Number of bytes that had been successfully transferred for the stream being processed.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.Error.uliTotalFileSize
member.summary: Size, in bytes, of the total file being processed.

member.name: COPYFILE2_MESSAGE.Info.Error.uliTotalBytesTransferred
member.summary: Number of bytes that had been successfully transferred for the entire copy operation.
